transcript.title: MESSAGE TO AMERCIA'S CUP CREW
transcript.content:
I> i2L
FPRWME MAINTER-_
FOR MEDIA 13 September 1983
The Prime Minister sent the following message to the America's
Cup Crew: " Congratulations on winning through to the final
challenger for the Amrerica's Cup. All down under will
be sailing with Australia II when the final series
begins. our hopes are high that you will sail into
history and bring back that el-usive cup. Whatever
the outcome, yours has been a magnificent venture.
All Australians are very proud of you. Bob Hawke"
